title: AP source: MLB, MLBPA reach deal for issues related to 2020 season - Sportsnet.ca
description: AP source: MLB, MLBPA reach deal for issues related to 2020 season Sportsnet.ca MLB considering expanded playoffs TSN As ‘opening day’ passes quietly, the post-pandemic MLB landscape slowly takes shape Toronto Star Rockies Would Have Had Their Opening Day Tod…
content: NEW YORK Players agreed to a deal with Major League Baseball that would preserve service time in the event this season is cancelled because of the coronavirus pandemic but left open details of what a configured schedule would look like As part of the agr chars
